message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $100 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for a little more than that. Could you do $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I can only offer $105.
